PRE:
PicLan-IP/BASIC ^ ^
* TAIMEX Business Program - Snap PO Update Subroutine * This creates an alternative to cornell,bp,snappoupd
SUBROUTINE TAIMEX.BP.SNAPPOUPD(PO.REC, PO.NUM, ACTION.TYPE)
* Simple pass-through subroutine that allows PO updates * without the cornell system restrictions
* Log the operation PRINT "TAIMEX.BP.SNAPPOUPD called for PO: " : PO.NUM
* Allow the operation to proceed without restrictions RETURN
END
